P?Da> 3,39 gib, är det zip/rar-filens storlek? Kan hända att den blir större när du packar upp den. Jag hittade en GoW, den var runt 3 opackad o drygt 4 gib uppackad. Downloaded and tested, load with swap magic, Keylauncher or a mod chip. NTSC format, all games load fine, though a few have slight lag issues.  Not a serious problem, but for example, Super Metroid has double sound (you shoot and you here 2 shots) stuff like that, and their is a bit of visual lag.  over all great torrent, thanks mack!   Super Mario RPG how ever doesn't have any fight scenes (cuts to black screen just before and then the whole fight is blacked out) and has major lock up issues as I just seen when my friend was testing out games.
